name: My Iron Skin
description:
Based on the inspiration driven by Gunnar Clovis' game jam random generator, our team has developed My Iron Skin, where the iron skin is the astronaut suit. Rapture was another theme we implemented with the attack on humanity.

Here is the credited random gen: https://gunnar-clovis.itch.io/game-jam-theme-generator

My Iron Skin is a survival horror with one mission: avoid the rapture.

An alien species has invaded Earth and has caused the mass extinction of humanity. You are the last astronaut, stranded in space and forced to land in an abandoned space station for supplies. It's quiet.

Listen and run from what stalks you. Grab the power cells. And escape.

This game is a class project for a university game development course, but there is potential we will expand this into publishing territory. Thanks for playing!
